feature.label: AAL Studio Application Packager
feature.description: This AAL Studio tool provides a multipart application packager that helps developer to create a compliant .uaap file. This .uaap file contains the parts selected by the developer as required to run an high-level uAAL application and an XML descriptor to support automatic setup on target nodes of the selected space.
